channel.description: Recent content in graphql on sambaiz-net

item.title: Query resources with NerdGraph, New Relic's GraphQL API
item.description: NerdGraph is New Relic’s GraphQL API and it can be used for querying resources or migrating it. curl -X POST https://api.newrelic.com/graphql \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \ -H 'API-Key: *****' \ -d '{ "query": "{ requestContext { userId apiKey } actor { user { name } } }" }' | jq { "data": { "actor": { "user": { "name": "Taiki Sakamoto" } }, "requestContext": { "apiKey": "*****", "userId": "*****" } } } If select resources in GraphiQL explorer, the query is generated.
